thread.title: Excellent stay, as always.
thread.title_full: Excellent stay, as always. - Review of Hotel Le M, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: ChristopherCapel
title: Excellent stay, as always.
text:
Always be sure to book direct on the Hotel Le M website for the best rates and offers. This is my fourth stay at the Hotel Le M. Efficient and friendly check-in. Always impeccably clean in bedrooms and public spaces. Nice little hotel bar for pre-dinner drink. Located in lively, central area of Paris. Plenty of bars and restaurants on the same road.
